title: 10. RECORDED BY NAT KING COLE
description: The greatest thing you’ll ever learn is to love and be loved in return.

title: 9. JUDY GARLAND
description: It was not into my ear you whispered, but my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.

title: 8. MAYA ANGELOU
description: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.

title: 7. KATHERINE HEPBURN
description: Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get — only what you are expecting to give — which is everything.

title: 6. MR. DARCY, PRIDE & PREJUDICE
description: You have bewitched me, body and soul.” Mr. Darcy, Pride & Prejudice.

title: 5. ANTOINE DE SAINT-EXUPÉRY
description: Love consists of not looking each other in the eye, but of looking outwardly in the same direction.

title: 4. A. A. MILNE
description: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.

title: 3. DR. SEUSS
description: You know when you’re in love when you can’t fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

title: 2. INGRID BERGMAN
description: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.

title: 1. NOTEBOOK
description: I want all of you, forever, you and me, every day.
